Text: <c.white><c.mono_sans>My Lady, pray, have you no time</c.mono_sans></c.white>

<c.white><c.mono_sans>a young man came to the door.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>We were all in the same bed.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>and the fact that a god chose</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>But if I hear you have harmed</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>You are the brother of the King,</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>but what if God has not sent</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>rather be the work of the devil?</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>My advice, sire, is that, as we</c.mono_sans></c.white>

<c.white><c.mono_sans>and that they are neither of God</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>The King did not know that his</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>He would like to talk to you</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I want to see how he lives,</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>you have decided to talk to us.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>of the Father, and of the Son,</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I do not think I heard you</c.mono_sans></c.white>

<c.white><c.mono_sans>No, you are the stupid one to</c.mono_sans></c.white>

<c.white><c.mono_sans>I swear to our Lord Jesus Christ</c.mono_sans></c.white>
